text.0: to indra flow these running drops these somas frolicsome in mood.
text.2: driving off foes bestowing room upon the presser willingly.
text.4: lightly disporting them the drops flow to one common reservoir.
text.5: and fall into the rivers wave.
text.6: these pavamanas have obtained all blessings much to be desired.
text.7: like coursers harnessed to a car.
text.8: with view to us o somadrops bestow his manifold desire.
text.9: on him who yet hath given us naught.
text.10: bring us our wish with this design as a wright brings his newwrought wheel.
text.11: flow pure and shining with the stream.
text.12: these drops have cried with resonant voice like swift steeds they have run the course.
text.13: and roused the good mans hymn to life.
